content.detailedDescription: Above an urban area where there is a steady amount of airline and helicopter traffic each day, a strange craft caught my attention through the window because of its odd color (red/orange) and how it was flickering.  at first i thought it was an airplane that was on fire and even considered the possibility that it might be on its way to crashing.  then i considered it maybe was a hot air baloon and the light was a fire beneath the balloon.  however neither of these were the case - it was most like a helicopter but it was silent and had the strange flickering light pattern.  during the minute or so that i watched it, it seemed to slow down and hover at a point above the residential neighborhood i am in, and then it picked up speed and headed off in a different direction (90 degrees to its apparent incoming approach).  somewhat nearsighted vision leaves me unable to clearly assess its shape or size.  it could have been a helicopter with a very unusual flame-like lighting pattern, or maybe a drone.  however i do not know what kind of drone can stop and then fly away towards the horizon into the clouds or wherever necessary to completely disappear from view.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Flame-like flickering flying object, slowed, hovered, and silently changed direction

content.detailedDescription: On july 28th, 2015 at 9:38pm i walked outside to let my dog out. upon reaching the end of my driveway i looked up in the sky looking for stars. immediately catching my attention were 2 bright red glowing orbs/lights in the north western sky. no stars were out/visible yet so the red orbs in the sky stuck out. after observing the objects for about 10 seconds i grabbed my cell phone out of my pocket and began to film the 2 lights. i filmed the lights for 34 seconds the entire encounter lasted about 2 minuets. the lights floated/flew across the sky at what seemed to be a speed faster then a plane. i see planes regularly over my house and know what they look/sound like during the day and night.  these orbs emitted no sound. over about 2 minuets the orbs floated/flew across the northern sky starting in the north west and ending in the north east. the bottom orb slightly lower and to the left of the top orb faded out first and the top orb faded out a few seconds after. during the sighting i was more focused on watching the objects in real time then watching through my phone i was also unsure my phone would even pick them up. i was in somewhat of an awe during the sighting. i was trying to rationalize what these lights could be. i stopped filming to focus on what i was looking at and maybe 30 seconds to a minuet after i stopped filming both objects had faded out. upon reviewing the footage from my phone/camera i noticed the objects appear white not red on film. i thought that was strange my camera on my phone is high quality and films in 1080p. i don't know what the objects were but i am quite sure on what they were not. they were not bugs, swamp gas, conventional aircraft, ballons, stars, planets, or comets.
content.summary: 2 bright red orbs/lights that emitted no noise and faded out.

content.detailedDescription:
On 8-1-2015 10:30 pm. just started to take a friend to motel and walking to car in my driveway when i noticed a red object moving over head from the sw about 500 to 1000 feet in the sky thought it was a helocopter but it looked like what i had seen 2 yrs ago at same location with my son. but another appeared following the first then one after another . i moved to my left so i could start counting the number of them and see better to the ne,stopped counting at 15 thought it was over but then more poped up out of nowhere moving in the same ne direction. it looked like one of the last few was trying to catch up to one farther ahead. when it did it remained behind and to the left of it.All objects moved from the sw to nw at the same speed,like a privet jet.
   all objects where red haze but could see little points of light within the haze. not one of them made any noise of any kind.Lost sight of them as they moved to the ne behind the trees.
   thought it was an invasion and they where on a bombing run. they flu in no apparent formation but offset from one another side to side and behind one another.  
   like i said i've seen the same objects 7-26,27-2015 an 0ne other that night that was directly over my head. it was a circle bright white light; thought it was space station but way to bright like a street lamp. as it moved straight up an away it got smaller and smaller til it disappeared. those red objects you could see 4 lights threw the red haze and they moved in a straight line accept the first one did a 90 degree move to its right twice as it was coming in my direction then stopped and hovered a minute and took off and up to its right over lake michigan an disappeared.The second followed the same path but when it took off i could follow the flight south over the lake,barely see it. it stopped at a very high altitude and started moving back towards land then i lost sight of it.My son has video on camera but poor quality.
   still can't believe my eyes to see this many at one time moving across the sky. wonder what the ---- is going on here in michigan. can make a drawing
content.summary: Moving sw to ne no sound red color 500' -1000' up over head following each other 100'apart no formation 15 to 20 objects

content.detailedDescription: I've had a telescope for a long time. i have charted the stars and observed of the moon. based on my years of experience i can tell the difference between a star and a planet. i can very well distinguish a satellite, an airplane and even a weather balloon. but what i saw today was nothing like it. i saw something that could only be observed through my telescope. i couldn't find it with my naked eye, not even with the telescope's finder. it was either very small or very far away. it was a round shaped object. the center was completely dark and the edges were visible too. around the object there were lights the formed a ring and around that ring there was another set of lights that formed another ring, however it was incomplete. only a half ring could be observed. at first i thought it was the reflection from the light of neighboring houses, but then one of my companions saw it too with his telescope. he described the lights as forming a three-point star outline rather than two rings. the object was moving very slow giving me enough time to change from one lens to another, something that is very hard to do when watching ordinary stars and planets. it was not moving in the direction of the earth, it was not orbiting, it was hovering it went from north to south, then it changed direction to the east. all this at a very slow rate. it disappeared behind some clouds and after that it began to rain.
content.summary: I saw a strange object hovering over the sky that could only be seen with my telescope.

content.detailedDescription:
I am a ham radio operator.. occasionally i like to go outside and look for satellites or the iss space station in order to practice my hobby.. 
where i live i live in or near a flight path to hobby airport and several other local smaller airports and am used to seeing aircraft coming in on approach and or taking off from hobby airport which is maybe 7 miles or so to the north east point to point i think.. 
also worked at an aviation maintenance school for 15 years  (northrop rice aviation, westwood aviation institute, and aviation institute of maintenance, and am used to working around planes and seeing them up close and far away, what they sound like etc etc.. 
seeing the light,in the west moving east, i first thought it was a plane on a glide slope coming in for landing.. but it was moving very slow, maybe less than 100mph..
hard to say for sure not being able to see any structure or able to make out altitude or distance.. i could just tell it was pretty high up.. and maybe at its closest within 5 miles as it passed by.. i heard no engine noise of any kind.. reciprocating or turboprop or jet.. 
the color of the light was whitish yellowish.. sort of like a slightly dimmed halogen bulb.. but it was pretty bright still while it was coming towards me from the east it was fairly dim.. i was trying to determine if it was a plane or satellite as i did not see any marker lights.. after about a minute it began to brighten quite a bit, by maybe a magnitude or two, to about the brightness of venus.. had never seen a plane do this. because there was still no marker lights i began to believe this was a satellite as this was pretty typical for a satellite.. for the most part.. about two minutes into its eastward track it made a gradual northeasterly turn and then another turn to the north when it was almost to the northwest of our house.. it continued for a minute or so and then began to make another east north east turn gradually.. never appeared to change altitude at all. by this time it was probably in the vicinity of hobby airport (over it) and began to dim considerably.. it continued on this trek until i could no longer see it.. 
while i can probably rule out a satellite, i am not so sure i can rule out a plane or helicopter.. was just strange to not see them using marker lights in that airspace, plus not hearing any engine or air sounds.. 

i am used to seeing lights and sometimes get excited if i see something i cannot explain but generally get a handle on myself and try to work through it.. (used to do a lot of ghost hunting, so i know not to always assume things are what i think they are). i try to use common sense and deductive reasoning.. this was strange enough and peaked my interest enough that i thought it might be worth reporting it. it was too dark for my camera on my phone to do any good.. if needed i could possibly try to sketch its path out on google earth
content.summary: Saw light in west thought it was satellite until it changed direction twice

content.detailedDescription: I was at the beach taking photos of the beach and my son. i didn't see the ufo until i viewed my photos. maybe light is playing tricks and reflecting an object that looks like a ufo?
content.summary: Only saw in my photo. did not see with my eyes as it was in the same area as the sun.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside walking my cat when i seen this object. 
what made me notice was i was watching the sky to see if i could see anything (ufo).

when i first saw it. thought maybe a bright star. but then it started moving slowly very slowly. it could of wobbled a little as it was traveling. kind of going in a straight path above me. the light was big and bright, no flashing of the light just still. was moving sw to ne.  
my feelings. was excited to see something. i wanted to see something tonight and i did. 
i lost track of it when it went over another wooded area in our small town.
content.summary: Seen a large white light object.

content.detailedDescription:
We left my girlfriends house in the car and noticed this what seemed to be low orange light making no sound. we slowly started driving and at one point seemed to be directly below the orange light, as we moved from being directly below to light to further down the street it really seemed like the object wasn't that high, but we couldn't hear anything.

we continued slowly driving, swapping the one pair of glasses we had back and forth looking at the object, which now appeared much higher in the sky, my girlfriend claims to of seen the object move near 2 stars and emit beams of light and smaller lights moving around the craft.

we finally stopped and i took the glasses to watch the object continue to move and then finally go from a orb of light into a beam that quickly 'flew in an arch' and vanished.

--note on the exit flight--

although the object appeared low at first, when it finally became a beam of light and flew away, the arch didn't appear in the sky like a plane, it appeared more like the light flew away and i saw the light as an arch due to the sphere shape of our planet, i believe i know what planes flight looks like and i do not believe this object was within our atmosphere when it made it's instant jump to high speed.

another member of our community had put on facebook "did anyone else see the ufo" although i haven't got an account from him as to what he saw.

i have heard people mention a similar light after our initial spotting but have not seen the light for a second time myself.
content.summary: Light seemed to be below clouds then suddenly seemed outside of atmosphere

content.detailedDescription: My husband & i were on vacation staying at a hotel in camden, maine.  we were sitting on the balcony taking in the fresh air & looking at the views to the harbor we had from our 3rd floor room. all of a sudden from behind one of the building i saw 2 lights.  they looked like they were over the harbor and flying straight toward me.  i ask my husband.  what is that?  what in the world is that?  he stands up & looks and says"i don't know.  maybe a plane". but as we continue to look they keep coming closer toward us but start to slow down.  then they stop. one of them gets closer. this is when we confirm  it's not a plane. then they separated a bit again & very slowly started coming towards us again.   then one stopped again and the other one went 360 around the one that stopped.  then both started going away towards the moon and slowly got further then they're lights got smaller & looked like 2 stars getting smaller & faded away into the sky.  i can't believe it. i never thought i'd be one to see or encounter such a thing.  i didn't move or blink.  just couldn't  loose sight of it because i felt like it was coming straight toward me.  at one point i felt like i might have to run in to the room because they seemed like they were coming straight at us.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: 2 lights at first looked like lightbulb shut more like fireballs moving simultaneously. then stopped and changed direction.

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 5:00 pm  spring 2011. i witnessed 2 black ltd's  from  1985 to 1988  with 4 men in each car. the vehicles were completely alike traveling  together within 6 feet of each other at 70 to 80 miles an hour. the men were  all tall the same height like manicanes. blond 
hair, black suits white shirts black ties. they all wre sitting completely strait up in  the seats , and no conversation was taking place. the two vehicles looked like they were gliding on the pavement.   carbon copies of each other from years  ago.
content.summary: Men in black sighting

content.detailedDescription:
While walking dog we noticed a bright yellowish planet type object moving in the sky from west to east at about 75 deg above horizon. it was a very clear night. it did not appear to be a plane since there was no flashing lights, noise or trail and did not have the movement of a plane as i will explain in detail. i ruled out a satellite or the iss for the following reasons.
 i observed the iss at much lower elevations above the horizon, traveling in a strait path at a consistant speed and following a nw to se orbit. this was nothing like that.

 it was not a satellite or iss because: 

1. the object was not traveling at a constant speed. it seemed to slow down then speed up constantly as it moved across the sky

2. at times the object seemed to wiggle or meander at times in a sense  that it shifted it's course slightly while moving very slowly then speed up again. we noticed this several times.

3. as it moved east the light did not seem to dim as a satellite or the iss would from loosing the reflection of the sun on the solar panels. to me this indicated the glow of the light was powered by the object and not reflected from the sun.  

4. the object was about the size as one would observe venus but not quite as bright but more yellow/orange in color. the object was visible at that intensity for several minutes. much longer than i have observed for anything in orbit.
content.summary: Between brightness of jupitor and venus.

content.detailedDescription: I seen it about 3am flying in a straight line and i signal it with a lazor then it vanished.I then tried using the flash on my phone to signal where it vanished and took two shots back to back.The second shot noticed it was on my roof.I could not see it with my eyes. but could here something walking around me in the grass but was unable to see it.It was a chilling thing because it was around 3-3:30am and i was outside alone. while this was happening the dogs started going completely crazy,barking snarling ext.The next day i downloaded an heat lens from app store.While playing with it i noticed there was a cigar shaped craft hovering high above my house and while panic to get the picture before it got behind the clouds i infact got the picture. after this around the same time every night, 10:30 pm it would head north over my home and flash one time then vanish.After this would see them just driving up the road out of nowhere would see an orb shoot straight up like a shooting star but would shoot litterly straight up!
content.summary: Seen it flying .Signal with lazer.Used flash from phone.Noticed on my roof.The next day different shape was hovering over house in clouds.

content.detailedDescription: We need to have a talk about this
content.summary: Parked car at home looked up saw a blimp light an hum sound car shaped object size of jumbo jet found out later

content.detailedDescription: I got undressed to shower. i saw 5 red circles on my body. they looked life when a dice rolls 5. they're not bumps, they don't hurt, itch or anything like that. i only noticed when i looked in the mirror. i had no idea what it was, so i googled it. ufo marking was all that came up. when i google imaged ufo markings on body, and the circle markings looked identical to what i had. i didn't see it appear, just found it. it didn't move. i started feeling paranoid, shocked, and scared. i then googled "signs that you've encountered aliens" and met many of the signs. i was almost too scared to go to bed, worried i'd wake up somewhere strange. the marking is still there, but the colour is a lot lighter than it was when i found it 3 days ago.
content.summary: I found red circle marks on my body. i googled it & identical images appear. google says it can be a ufo mark

content.detailedDescription: See above
content.summary: Dog barked,wife looked out frnt i looked in back and a red lazer entered eyes,wife said look up and there it was,,a pyramid  of glowing balls no sound,moving along slowly at first then woosh gone..

content.detailedDescription: My wife to be and myself left the house to take our dog for a walk and immediately stepping outside there was this circular yellow/orange light sort of moving slowly and hoovering almost above us. it seemed to be quite big and not too high but difficult to tell because there was no point of reference and the event only lasted aprox. 15 seconds so it wasnt enough time to observe distance and size. nevertheless, 15 seconds is long enough to know what it is and what it isnt. the event ended by the object taking off in a flash and disappearing. i know it was an object and not just a light because once it took off its light went out and i had a partial glimpse of an object before disappearing upwards. i didnt recall hearing any sound though my fiancee says she heard something. it was a clear warm evening. the dynamics of this object not a natural phenomena and not of this world. 3 days later (the time it took me to process this in my head)  i decided to do a google search for ovni st. jérôme and it took me to a french website similar to this one and someone actually reported the same event only with more détails and even a video. this witness was a little farther away than me and more west therefore his viewing angle was different. the video shows a perfect circle whereas we viewed a distorted circle - though this person saw 3 separate appirations and only filmed one of them. we only saw 1 appiration - probably the final one.
content.summary: Mysterious yellow/orange lighted object moving/hoovering slowly before taking off and disappearing in a blink of an eye

content.detailedDescription:
As i was saying, this craft was just hovering mid-air and then i noticed a plane heading straight for the craft. then when the plane got close it the craft descended in a blink of an eye to avoid a possible mid-air collision. then the 3 lights went out one at a time and then it was just gone. like it vanished in thin air. and this isn't my first encounter. i have many photos & recordings that aren't human or man made. i'm good friends with joe palermo & debbie z. i hope this helps with are continuous search for the truth. thank you, 
                           chase reisinger
content.summary: I was standing on my back porch star gazing when i began to see a lot of planes in the sky which were millitary i believe because of there speed. then i noticed a triangular shaped craft with 3 blinking lights. it was just hovering mid-air

content.detailedDescription: Preface my sighting with stating i am commercial rated pilot with approximately 800 hours flying time. my license is not currently active. i stepped outside my front door at 11:30pm to have a cigarette. my vision is better than 20/20. my hearing is excellent. the sky was clear and it was very quiet with no discernible wind. i was facing north. within a minute of being outside i noticed what i first thought was a plane coming in my direction. by the time the object was directly over me i noticed that the bottom of the object was round shaped. the illuminated color was a solid orange-yellow. my estimate of it's altitude was 6-8000 feet. my estimate of it's speed was 3-400 kts. it was certainly moving faster than the 250 kt. speed restriction on planes flying below 10,000 ft. msl. as it passed over me i became acutely aware of trying to listen for any noise from the object, thinking it might be a jet. it emitted no noise. it continued in a straight path flying to the south. i lost sight of it through tall trees behind me. i turned back facing north and within 15 seconds of losing sight of the first object, i noticed another similar object following the first object's same flight path, at approximately the same altitude, speed, same size and same illuminated solid orange-yellow. again there was no noise. i lost sight of the second object the same way as i lost sight of the first one. neither object had any strobe lights which is a faa requirement for flying at night. their color was solid and bright. i've spent my life interested in aviation. i'm very familiar with all types of aircraft. the two objects i saw flying were unidentifiable. the propulsion system they used to fly at that speed did not emit any noise whatsoever.
content.summary: Witnessed two ufo's traveling directly over my house. the ufo's were spaced about 15 seconds apart each traveling on the same path.

content.detailedDescription: We were sightseeing in morgantown wva and we were checking out the view over morgantown and took this picture of two objects in the sky. we didn't actually see them in the sky.  it wasn't until we got home and looked at our pics and realized we had captured something. though it's not the first time we've seen ufos in morgantown. we saw one two summers ago doing crazy zig zagging and then we saw one a few years before that that were orangish boomerang shape just hovering then shoot into outer space. that first one. ..My husband and i saw and in unison remarked "what is that"? thats when it shot into outer space.  we both agreed we saw a ufo. the second one, we weren't really surprised. this is becoming such a common thing.  we know others who have seen them.
content.summary: Two objects in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Shot this picture in october of 2014 in new york city while taking the ferry. several helicopters (3 to be exact ranging in colors: red, black and white ) where in the area doing their typical tourist ventures. after the trip i was re-examining the pics and noticed this weird shape object that did not show up on any other pic shot after. i have included the next pic where  the object is no longer visible yet i see the background some  exhaust fumes unsure of its relatedness. plane, helicopter or very large bird?
content.summary: Have experienced a lot paranormal activity and normal to experiene alien like experiences as well.

content.detailedDescription: It was wednesday july 29th around 10:30pm and i was in my kitchen putting dinner away after gettin my kids to bed when i heard my dogs who are usually very quite start to bark and howl. i opened my sliding glass door to see why they were barking and witnessed them looking southeast at the sky and when i looked to see what they were looking at i witnessed 4 very large bright glowing red/orange balls of lights hovering high up in the sky. i watched them as the slowly shifted positions randomly. i ran inside to get my husband to see them and asked him what he thought they were and he could only describe them as very large balls of fire in the sky. we continued to watch them for about 5 mins as they continued to move randomly but staying in the same area close to eachother. i ran inside to get my camera and when i returned ther was only three left and they had formed a straight line with each other. i was able to get a few pictures before they vanished in what seemed like mid picture. i searched the sky's to all directions to see if i could relocate these lights but was never able to. while watching these lights i couldn't help but feel a sense of fear, dread, and depression like something was very wrong. i continued to look for the lights for the rest of the night and the next two nights following this event. i never seen the lights again.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 4 very bright red/orange lights in the night sky above the salton sea

content.detailedDescription:
Perfectly clear cloudless afternoon went out to the front porch on a home i was remodeling. looked up to the north of cedar falls and saw approx 15 translucent white/blue spheres rotating moderately in unison to each other. surmised to myself some local event had occurred and i was seeing small balloons. noticed it was pretty breezy and wondered how balloons could keep together and rotate equally to each other.  continued watching the spheres rotate in unison and then completely disappear then reappear a few seconds later. watched this for approx two minutes and then decided to video the event.  once i had my cell phone video ready the spheres fell away from my line of sight behind local neighborhood trees. googled the local waterloo airport tower and phoned them if they had any other reports of anomalies, they had not, other than mine at that time. my entire life, i have been looking skyward and had never witnessed anything couldn’t explain naturally, this incident baffles me. 

i originally posted this info to another site that same day and since have revisited my post and have seen others witnessed/posted this in my local city at the same time, same day, same city..
content.summary: Cluster of approx 15 spheres rotating oval, translusant red, white, all disappear then reappear

content.detailedDescription: I was walking on the track at springville high school in springville utah around 8:30-9pm and decided to take a photo of the moon. i didn't notice the objects until i posted the photo on my facebook page. the blue spheres are clear and obvious. i was unaware of the objects at the time i took the photo, without my glasses. however, the bottoms of my feet began burning and i found it difficult to walk home and the pain continued for almost two days. i don't know why or if it was connected but it has never happened before. because i didn't notice the objects at the time i took the photo,  i don't know how long the objects were in the sky.
content.summary: Upon posting on facebook i noticed the two blue spheres

content.detailedDescription:
On 07.31.15 @ 2:30-3 am i took a picture of the blue moon, did not see anything but the moon. after i took the picture, with galaxy 3, i noticed a (i think its a planet, i don't know.) can you look over the pic and let me know what  it is.
outside looking at the moon.
i thought it was planet x,nibiru, right under the moon.
i could not tell if it was behind the moon or in front of it.
let all know, this is scary stuff.
content.summary: Under the blue moon

content.detailedDescription: My mom and i were sitting on my front porch visiting. i noticed two round objects to my right, thru the trees. they made no sound! the were glowing a reddish color. i ran into my front yard to get a closer look and grabbed my phone to get photos. they were traveling in a linear pattern, fairly close to each other. i was able to view them flying at a fairly quick rate of speed. there were no other aircraft of any kind in the sky. i e never seen anything like this! it was not a balloon, plane or helicopter- i watched the objects for as long as i could. certainly an event! some residents on my city have also told me they have witnessed these objects. i do reside near wpafb- this is not a joke- i am a nurse and a mom- feel free to contact me for more info
content.summary: Two round objects, silent, emitting a reddish glow- following each other- myself and another witness saw these objects. i have photos. i followed as much as i could

content.detailedDescription: I’m from bharatpur, chitwan, nepal. i just see a ufo. first i see a star like thing in the night. it was very cloudy so no other stars were seen. i looked at it and it just flew a little bit up. i ignored it and after few sec i see the same star like thing falling down. i started praying when suddenly the thing stopped in its way. i was shocked. rather it flewed upwards. i looked at it and a very high speed, it flew away. i have seen jet planes flying before and that speed was more than 20 times than that of normal plane.
content.summary: I’m from bharatpur, chitwan, nepal. i just see a ufo. first i see a star like thing that flewed little bit up. i ignored and it flew down like a falling star. it made me ahocked. then it flew above and very fast and disapperead

content.detailedDescription:
I was observing the sky as i usually do when i noticed moving lighs heading towards me i then sat on he balcony over looking the north aspect and continued watching thru the lense at the show before me,
it was quite orderly but in saying that moments of just what seemed crazy happened, darting and chasing popping things from them selves. all in all it was pretty cool lasted about an hour and half, actually still looking out as i type, jumped on the pc and did a quick search to see if i am the only oneseeing this,coouldnt find anything, thought interesting all the same, cheers. a



i though it was stars and i was tired but i really are not, it felt surreal but yet i knew what i was seeing.Even grabbed my partner to check it out

objects appear random as i type.
content.summary: I was just trying out my new bionoculars and telescope when i noticed about 5 - 10 star like object coming from the north towards me,then all the lights started behaviing oddly, moving darting chasing , then lined up then crazy again, strange.

content.detailedDescription: I have had problems with ufos/aliens  all my life i have a lot to tell iv been scratched needle pricked multiple times iv had hand prints on my chest after waking up iv caught multiplable different glimpses of grey beings at my home and would like some help or at least a better explanation of why.  i have a picture of a grey alien that i took last nite looking into my window and i also have a unexplainable unhuman like finger print on a different window other than the window i got the picture from u have to look close at the picture but it's there and it's not fake i do promise not made up not photo shoped it 100 percent this picture was taken around 2am at the living room window of my home i'm no longer afraid of them i'm 57 years old and iv had problem since i was about 8 i would like to talk to some knowledgeable investigaters and get some help if there is any.
content.summary: Grey big eyes about 4 ft tall have picture looking into my window also have finger print and other evidence

content.detailedDescription: We lived about 20 to 30 feet near the ocean in arecibo, puerto rico in a wooden house. it was me, my brother, two sisters and my mother. the events occurred roughly around 1977 to 1978, don't recall the exact day or month, but it occurred during the night. i would experience this ball of light that would get smaller as it came closer to me, and i felt as if i couldn't breath and it used to paralyzed me, and  i couldn't even talk or move. i thought that it was just a recuring nightmare, and never said a word to anyone. fastforward to about 4 years ago, and we were telling family stories in my mothers home, when my mother started telling her story about the ball of light that used to come at night and as it came closer to her, she would experience the same thing that i did. then my siter said that it used to happen to her too. we found out that it happened to all of us, all five of us. then i knew that it couldn't had been nightmares that i used have, because 5 people can not have the same nightmares at the same time and place. my older sister then said that she witnessed shadow people standing by her bed, and that they used touch her in sick ways and used to laugh at her. my mother also said she had seen an uso come out the ocean at night, when she was looking out to the ocean around 2 to 3 am. i also keep waking up at 3:27am for some reason, it always happens. i am sensetive to light and like to always have the lights off. i was just a child back then, around 4 years old, but i have never forgotten that. after we moved from that house in 1980, none of my family ever expirience that again, but i have expiriced it, the last time was about 4 months ago. i did not see the ball of light, but expirimce sleep paralysis. my son was sleeping next to me and i could not move or talk, i kept trying to tell my son to help me, but couldn't speak or move, it was a scary experience, as is always has been. i want to know if mufon ever had cases like this one?  i would appreciate any help or information that mufon maybe able to provide me. i swear that everything i just wrote is the truth. my mother was diagnosed with alzhimer's and she is 65 years old, i want to be able to provide my family with some answers, especially my mother while she is still cognizant. thank you!
content.summary: I experience a ball of light that would appear in my room when i was in bed and as it came closer to my chest, i would remain paralyzed, i was just 4 years old at the time, but about 3 to 4 years ago, i learned that it happened to all 5 of us.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in front of my laptop watching some videos. then i went to the bathroom to smoke a cigarette and i opened the window. that was when i heard strange noises outside; they slowly became louder as if the ufo came closer. i looked in the sky and i spotted a weird aircraft. on it's bottom side lights shined in red and green and another bigger one in white. it hovered over the city, slowly moving north and it then moved faster straight north-west.
content.summary: Ufo over hohen neuendorf, red and green lights, loud noises from the aircraft
